snippet: The frenzy of interest in the French press over the reported liaison between President François Hollande and an actress, Julie Gayet, has laid bare that the vaunted privacy of a French president is an illusion.
abstract: The frenzy of interest in the French press over the reported liaison between President François Hollande and an actress, Julie Gayet, has laid bare that the vaunted privacy of a French president is an illusion.
